oai_dc:dc.dc:title: REVISED WAVE FORECASTING RELATIONSHIPS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bretschneider, C. L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wind-wave generation
wave forecasting
wind-wave decay
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Data on the generation and decay of wind-generated gravity waves have been collected for several years by the University of California. These data together with the original data by Sverdrup and Munk have been analyzed, and the results were presented in dimensionless graphs suitable for use in wave forecasting (Bretschneider, 1951). No analysis was made of the effect of following or opposing winds.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 2 (1951): Proceedings of Second Conference on Coastal Engineering, Houston, Texas, 1951.; 1
